# a beggar who pretends, along with his wife and children, to be a victim of a fire
types.html:
rifodé m (plural rifodés)

  1. a beggar who pretends, along with his wife and children, to be a victim of a fire
trans: a beggar who pretends, along with his wife and children, to be a victim of a fire

title: rifodé
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ʁi.fɔ.de/
